name: Frigid Peak
description:
An arcade style platformer where the goal is to avoid obstacles and reach the top of the mountain to take a selfie with the Yeti. 

Controls

  • A & D - To move left and right
  • W & S - Climb rope
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse Click - Interact with UI buttons
